  • メソッド
com.astamuse.asta4d.data

インタフェース ContextDataFinder

  • 既知の実装クラスのリスト:
    DefaultContextDataFinder

    public interface ContextDataFinder
    This interface declares how to find a certain data in Context. Because there are customized scopes, so an implementation can customize the search logic against special scope.
    作成者:
    e-ryu

    • メソッドの概要

      メソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      ContextDataHolder findDataInContext(Context context, String scope, String name, Class<?> type)
      find data from given context by certain logic

    • メソッドの詳細

      • findDataInContext

        ContextDataHolder findDataInContext(Context context,
                                  String scope,
                                  String name,
                                  Class<?> type)
                                    throws DataOperationException
        find data from given context by certain logic
        パラメータ:
        context - Context
        scope - scope
        name - data saved key
        type - data type
        戻り値:
        the data saved in context or null if not found
        例外:
        DataOperationException
